pr_title: GEODE-8173: Add unit test (coverage) for PartitionedRegionClear class.

timeline.message: GEODE-8173: Add unit test (coverage) for PartitionedRegionClear class.

Fixing test issue in PR pipeline.
The afterDestroy() could be triggered more than once in a server.
Another test case in this test verifies similarlly.

timeline.bodyText: Probably should use proper types for the Regions and Sets etc rather than raw types.
timeline.author: mhansonp

timeline.bodyText: I hate the idea of adding methods like this to Regions. It has nothing to do with Region. Maybe Transaction or TransactionManager would be a better place for this method.
timeline.author: kirklund

timeline.bodyText:
We should be declaring vars as the interface instead of the impl:
Set<BucketRegion> bucketRegions = new HashSet<>();
timeline.author: kirklund

timeline.bodyText:
You typically want to avoid if-else blocks like this, and separate it into two different tests. One for PR and one for Replicate.
The test class is ReplicateCacheListenerDistributedTest. I can't find any PartitionedRegions being created in this test. Does this belong in PRCacheListenerDistributedTest instead?
timeline.author: kirklund

timeline.bodyText: I think this should be releaseClearLockLocal() instead?

replies.bodyText:
Good catch. Thanks.
Updated the test.
